00221 \textcolor{keyword}{static} GLuint _glewStrLen (\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* s)
00222 \{
00223   GLuint i=0;
00224   \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (s == NULL) \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} 0;

00229 \textcolor{keyword}{static} GLuint _glewStrCLen (\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* s, GLubyte c)
00230 \{
00231   GLuint i=0;
00232   \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (s == NULL) \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} 0;
00233   \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (s[i] != \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)0'} && s[i] != c) i++;
00234   \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} (s[i] == \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)0'} || s[i] == c) ? i : 0;
00235 \}

00237 \textcolor{keyword}{static} GLboolean _glewStrSame (\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* a, \textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* b, GLuint n)
00238 \{
00239   GLuint i=0;
00240   \textcolor{keywordflow}{if}(a == NULL || b == NULL)
00241     \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} (a == NULL && b == NULL && n == 0) ? GL_TRUE : GL_FALSE;
00242   \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (i < n && a[i] != \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)0'} && b[i] != \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)0'} && a[i] == b[i]) i++;
00243   \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} i == n ? GL_TRUE : GL_FALSE;
00244 \}

00246 \textcolor{keyword}{static} GLboolean _glewStrSame1 (\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte** a, GLuint* na, \textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* b, 
      GLuint nb)
00247 \{
00248   \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (*na > 0 && (**a == \textcolor{charliteral}{' '} || **a == \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)n'} || **a == \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)r'} || **a == \textcolor{charliteral}{'\(\backslash\)t'}))
00249   \{
00250     (*a)++;
00251     (*na)--;
00252   \}
00253   \textcolor{keywordflow}{if}(*na >= nb)
00254   \{
00255     GLuint i=0;
00256     \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (i < nb && (*a)+i != NULL && b+i != NULL && (*a)[i] == b[i]) i++;
00257     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if}(i == nb)
00258     \{
00259       *a = *a + nb;
00260       *na = *na - nb;
00261       \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} GL_TRUE;
00262     \}
00263   \}
00264   \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} GL_FALSE;
00265 \}

00299 \textcolor{comment}{/*}
00300 \textcolor{comment}{ * Search for name in the extensions string. Use of strstr()}
00301 \textcolor{comment}{ * is not sufficient because extension names can be prefixes of}
00302 \textcolor{comment}{ * other extension names. Could use strtok() but the constant}
00303 \textcolor{comment}{ * string returned by glGetString might be in read-only memory.}
00304 \textcolor{comment}{ */}
00305 \textcolor{keyword}{static} GLboolean _glewSearchExtension (\textcolor{keyword}{const} \textcolor{keywordtype}{char}* name, \textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte *start, \textcolor{keyword}{const} 
      GLubyte *end)
00306 \{
00307   \textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte* p;
00308   GLuint len = _glewStrLen((\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte*)name);
00309   p = start;
00310   \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (p < end)
00311   \{
00312     GLuint n = _glewStrCLen(p, \textcolor{charliteral}{' '});
00313     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (len == n && _glewStrSame((\textcolor{keyword}{const} GLubyte*)name, p, n)) \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} GL_TRUE;
00314     p += n+1;
00315   \}
00316   \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} GL_FALSE;
00317 \}
